item.title: Configuration
item.description: Kafka uses key-value pairs in the property file format for configuration. These values can be supplied either from a file or programmatically. Broker Configs The essential configurations are the following: node.id log.dirs process.roles controller.quorum.bootstrap.servers Topic configurations and defaults are discussed in more detail below. node.id The node ID associated with the roles this process is playing when process.roles is non-empty. This is required configuration when running in KRaft mode. Type:int Default: Valid Values:[0,.
